Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Family | Lifestyle
Status: Returning Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Wednesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: December 06, 2011
Episode Order: 7

"MOONSHINERS" tells the story of those who brew their shine - whether in the woods behind their house using camouflaged equipment or legally in their garages for local distribution - and the local authorities who try to keep them honest. The series show what life is like in the Appalachian Mountain region, a close-knit society where survival depends on resourcefulness and endurance. From hunting bear and raccoon to catching frogs and catfish, theirs is a world forgotten by modern conveniences. (Source: The Discovery Channel) 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-29973)
